      • copy

        public static long copy(InputStream from,
                        OutputStream to)
                 throws IOException
        From Google Guava copy within ByteStreams Copies all bytes from the input stream to the output stream. Does not close or flush either stream.
        Parameters:
        from - the input stream to read from
        to - the output stream to write to
        Returns:
        the number of bytes copied
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
